title: Help a Bronze 4 ADC main out, by stomping him.
body:
Hey guys,
I was wondering if a relatively high ELO (gold +), ADC main wants to jump on skype with me and play ~10 minute customs to help me with my early game csing and to learn my limits. I'm more than happy to get stomped as long as I'm given constructive criticism and you don't hate on me in the skype call.
Thanks :)

Add me, I'm og1764

replies.body:
[This](http://imgur.com/orWUCKH) helped me practice my csing and so on, I was Bronze 3 at the start of the season and now I'm silver 5 and still going strong :)

Hopefully this can help you too.

Bear in mind that the enemy support will usually be the one you need to pay more attention to since they will usually be the one doing most of the poking or looking to engage on you in the early game, so 1v1s might not be the best practice
Just work on your positioning and last hitting. Those are perhaps the most important aspects of farming in my opinion.
